channel.title: Opinions – AWSPEAK
channel.description: We focus on the most popular products surrounding the latest breaking news.

item.title: Build your own laptop screen with recycled parts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Fun, as you might imagine, was not how I would describe this adventure. Awesome? Yes. Fun? No. N.O. No way. But would I do it again? If I could rewind to that moment when the alarm went off at 4:30 a.m. to throw on clothes, grab our packs and trek up that mountain, would I? […]

The post Build your own laptop screen with recycled parts appeared first on AWSPEAK.

item.title: Spend the night at one of these gorgeous church hotels
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
With their feet dangling, and amusing themselves–until I stopped them–by throwing stones at the giant mass. After I had spoken to them about it, they began playing at “touch” in and out of the group of bystanders. Among these were a couple of cyclists, a jobbing gardener I employed sometimes, a girl carrying a baby, […]
